cause.description:
Go to: http://www.instantkarma.org/InstantKarma.html to sign a petition and purchase the incredible musical tribute to John Lennon directly. The Instant Karma project is managed by Amnesty International and all funds will support humanitarian aid to Darfur. On the forefront of America's social conscience., this CD is unbelievable.
1. Imagine there's no hunger...
2. No fear, no pain.
3. Power to the people.
cause.name: Campaign to Save Darfur
